mapper.insert: insert into partner_contract_refunds (refund_id, platform_id, purchase_id, amount, account_type, created, updated, is_deleted, account_info, images) values (#{refundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{created,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{accountInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{images,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update partner_contract_refunds set platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purchase_id = #{purchaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_type = #{accountType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created = #{created,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, account_info = #{accountInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, images = #{images,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where refund_id = #{refundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select refund_id, platform_id, purchase_id, amount, account_type, created, updated, is_deleted, account_info, images from partner_contract_refunds where refund_id = #{refundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
